languages.text: {n}Сшитое из кусков, как и все остальное тело, лицо похоже на калейдоскоп плоти — бледной друкарской, неизвестной вам сизой и странно знакомой, покрытой шрамами от ожогов... Вам знакома и эта кожа, и один глаз, взирающий на вас с перекошенного рыла. Когда-то они принадлежали человеку по имени Ахиллеас Скаландр. Шпиону Инквизиции. Изменнику.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Сшитое из кусков, как и все остальное тело, лицо похоже на калейдоскоп плоти — бледной друкарской, неизвестной вам сизой и странно знакомой, покрытой шрамами от ожогов... Вам знакома и эта кожа, и один глаз, взирающий на вас с перекошенного рыла. Когда-то они принадлежали человеку по имени Ахиллеас Скаландр. Шпиону Инквизиции. Изменнику.{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}Just like the rest of the body, the stitched-up face is a patchwork of flesh: pale Drukhari skin, spotted hide of unknown origin, and strangely familiar burn scars... You know these scars and the single eye looking at you from the misshapen head. They used to belong to a man named Achilleas Scalander. A spy for the Inquisition. A traitor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сшитое из кусков, как и все остальное тело, лицо похоже на калейдоскоп плоти — бледной друкарской, неизвестной вам сизой и странно знакомой, покрытой шрамами от ожогов... Вам знакома и эта кожа, и один глаз, взирающий на вас с перекошенного рыла. Когда-то они принадлежали человеку по имени Ахиллеас Скаландр. Шпиону Инквизиции. Изменнику.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Just like the rest of the body, the stitched-up face is a kaleidoscope of flesh — pale Drukhari skin, unknown spotted hide and strangely familiar burn scars... You know these scars and the single eye looking at you from the misshapen head. They used to belong to a man named Achilleas Scalander. A spy for the Inquisition. A traitor.{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant

You know these scars and the single eye looking at you from the misshapen head. They used to belong to a man named Achilleas Scalander. A spy for the Inquisition. A traitor.{/n}

You know these scars and the single eye looking at you from the misshapen head. They used to belong to a man named Achilleas Scalander. A spy for the Inquisition. A traitor.{/n}

You know these scars and the single eye looking at you from the misshapen head. They used to belong to a man named Achilleas Scalander. A spy for the Inquisition. A traitor.{/n}

You know these scars and the single eye looking at you from the misshapen head. They used to belong to a man named Achilleas Scalander. A spy for the Inquisition. A traitor.{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant

traits.locale_text: {n}Just like the rest of the body, the stitched-up face is a patchwork of flesh: pale Drukhari skin, spotted hide of unknown origin, and strangely familiar burn scars... You know these scars and the single eye looking at you from the misshapen head. They used to belong to a man named Achilleas Scalander. A spy for the Inquisition. A traitor.{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}胴体の他の部分と同じように、縫い合わされた顔はまるで肉のパッチワークだ。青白いデュカーリの皮膚、見知らぬ斑点のある皮、そして妙に見覚えのある火傷の傷跡…この傷跡と、不格好な頭にある、こちらを見ているその目を覚えている。アキレアス・スカランダーという男のものだ。異端審問庁のスパイだった、裏切り者だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Just like the rest of the body, the stitched-up face is a patchwork of flesh: pale Drukhari skin, spotted hide of unknown origin, and strangely familiar burn scars... You know these scars and the single eye looking at you from the misshapen head. They used to belong to a man named Achilleas Scalander. A spy for the Inquisition. A traitor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}胴体の他の部分と同じように、縫い合わされた顔はまるで肉のパッチワークだ。青白いデュカーリの皮膚、見知らぬ斑点のある皮、そして妙に見覚えのある火傷の傷跡…この傷跡と、不格好な頭にある、こちらを見ているその目を覚えている。アキレアス・スカランダーという男のものだ。異端審問庁のスパイだった、裏切り者だ。{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}它的脸和身体的其他部分一样，也都是由很多块肉缝合而成，有苍白的黑暗灵族皮肤，带着斑点的皮肉，还有古怪的烧伤疤痕，看起来很熟悉……你认出了这些疤痕，也认出了那只畸形脑袋里盯着你的独眼，它们曾属于一个叫阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德的人。那个人是审判庭的特工，也是个叛徒。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Just like the rest of the body, the stitched-up face is a patchwork of flesh: pale Drukhari skin, spotted hide of unknown origin, and strangely familiar burn scars... You know these scars and the single eye looking at you from the misshapen head. They used to belong to a man named Achilleas Scalander. A spy for the Inquisition. A traitor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}它的脸和身体的其他部分一样，也都是由很多块肉缝合而成，有苍白的黑暗灵族皮肤，带着斑点的皮肉，还有古怪的烧伤疤痕，看起来很熟悉……你认出了这些疤痕，也认出了那只畸形脑袋里盯着你的独眼，它们曾属于一个叫阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德的人。那个人是审判庭的特工，也是个叛徒。{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}Al igual que el resto de su cuerpo, su cara esta cosida a base de retales: pálida piel Drukhari, cuero moteado de origen desconocido y cicatrices de quemadura extrañamente familiares... Las reconoces, así como al ojo solitario que te observa desde su cabeza deforme. Pertenecían a un hombre llamado Achilleas Scalander, espía de la Inquisición... y traidor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Just like the rest of the body, the stitched-up face is a patchwork of flesh: pale Drukhari skin, spotted hide of unknown origin, and strangely familiar burn scars... You know these scars and the single eye looking at you from the misshapen head. They used to belong to a man named Achilleas Scalander. A spy for the Inquisition. A traitor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Al igual que el resto de su cuerpo, su cara esta cosida a base de retales: pálida piel Drukhari, cuero moteado de origen desconocido y cicatrices de quemadura extrañamente familiares... Las reconoces, así como al ojo solitario que te observa desde su cabeza deforme. Pertenecían a un hombre llamado Achilleas Scalander, espía de la Inquisición... y traidor.{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}Wie der Rest des Körpers ist auch das zusammengeschusterte Gesicht ein Flickenteppich aus Fleisch: fahle Drukhari-Haut, ein fleckiges Leder unbekannter Herkunft und merkwürdig vertraute Narben von Brandwunden ... Du kennst diese Narben und das einzelne Auge, das dich aus dem unförmigen Kopf heraus anblickt. Sie gehörten einmal einem Mann namens Achilleas Scalander. Einem Spion der Inquisition. Einem Verräter.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Just like the rest of the body, the stitched-up face is a patchwork of flesh: pale Drukhari skin, spotted hide of unknown origin, and strangely familiar burn scars... You know these scars and the single eye looking at you from the misshapen head. They used to belong to a man named Achilleas Scalander. A spy for the Inquisition. A traitor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Genau wie der Rest des Körpers ist auch das zusammengeschusterte Gesicht ein Flickenteppich aus Fleisch: fahle Drukhari-Haut, ein unbekanntes fleckiges Leder und merkwürdig vertraute Narben von Brandwunden ... Du kennst diese Narben und das einzelne Auge, das dich aus dem unförmigen Kopf heraus anblickt. Sie gehörten einmal einem Mann namens Achilleas Scalander. Einem Spion der Inquisition. Einem Verräter.{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}Tout comme le reste du corps, son visage est composé d'un entrelacs de chair : de la peau pâle de Drukhari, une autre d'origine inconnue et constellée de taches, des brûlures qui vous sont vaguement familières... Vous connaissez ces cicatrices, tout comme vous reconnaissez l'unique œil fixé sur vous. Tout cela appartenait à un homme du nom d'Achilleas Scalander. Un espion de l'Inquisition. Un traître.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Just like the rest of the body, the stitched-up face is a patchwork of flesh: pale Drukhari skin, spotted hide of unknown origin, and strangely familiar burn scars... You know these scars and the single eye looking at you from the misshapen head. They used to belong to a man named Achilleas Scalander. A spy for the Inquisition. A traitor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tout comme le reste du corps, son visage est composé d'un entrelacs de chair : de la peau pâle de Drukhari, une autre d'origine inconnue et constellée de taches, mais également des brûlures qui vous sont vaguement familières... Vous connaissez ces cicatrices, tout comme vous reconnaissez l'unique œil fixé sur vous. Tout cela appartenait à un homme du nom d'Achilleas Scalander. Un espion de l'Inquisition. Un traître.{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}Bedeninin geri kalanı gibi dikiş içindeki yüzü, et parçalarından oluşma bir yama. Solgun Drukhari derisi; kökeni bilinmeyen, benekli kürkü ve ilginç derecede tanıdık gelen yanık izleri... Bu yaraları ve şekilsiz kafadan sana bakan o tek gözü tanıyorsun. Bunlar, bir vakitler Achilleas Scalander olarak bilinen adama ait. Engizisyon casusu ve bir hain.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Just like the rest of the body, the stitched-up face is a patchwork of flesh: pale Drukhari skin, spotted hide of unknown origin, and strangely familiar burn scars... You know these scars and the single eye looking at you from the misshapen head. They used to belong to a man named Achilleas Scalander. A spy for the Inquisition. A traitor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bedeninin geri kalanı gibi dikiş içindeki yüzü, et parçalarından oluşma bir yama işi. Solgun Drukhari derisi, bilinmeyen bir kökene sahip benekli kürkü ve ilginç derecede tanıdık gelen yanık izleri... Bu yaraları ve şekilsiz kafadan sana bakan o tek gözü tanıyorsun. Bunlar, bir vakitler Achilleas Scalander adındaki bir adama ait. Engizisyon casusu ve bir hain.{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant
